item.title: Multimonitor setup in bspwm
item.description: Multiple monitor setup - bspwm + Polybar Required packages: bspwm polybar xrandr autorandr Detect connected displays First of all, we want to check the discriptors of connected displays with this command: > xrandr --listmonitors Monitors: 2 0: +*eDP1 1920/280x1080/160+0+0 eDP1 1: +HDMI2 1680/470x1050/300+1920+0 HDMI2 Let’s remember these; I’ll describe my monitors as eDP1 (my laptop’s display) and HDMI2 (external monitor). Startup script Next, we’re going to create a script which detects an external monitor when connected, moves bspwm desktops to it and removes those when a monitor is disconnected.
